page.title: 17LOCAL RESIDENT,TREVERVA
page.content: A local resident lives in an old vicarage not far from the church.The house is very large and is in need of repairs.She shares the house with her sister who is often abroad.Her husband is often abroad because of work.The grounds around the house come to about an acre and a half.The grounds support a wide range of trees and undergrowth. The owner is called Mrs. Popple and she has been living there for 18 months.The thing she likes most about the area is that it is peaceful and the countryside .There is nothing that she really dislikes except that it is miles from shops etc.Her typical day involves taking her son to school and sometimes she works as a freelance secretary.
